column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We came here for lunch
column2: because it was walking distance from our hotel and had really great ratings. My husband was craving a deep dish Chicago pizza
column3: I just wanted a salad and my son wanted a pizza. They had an awesome lunch special with drinks
column4: personal pizza and a salad. My three year old son and I split our meal. My husband said it was okay
column5: but would have probably been better if we had ordered a whole pizza and split it. He said it wasn't the same. I don't know
column6: because I've never had one before
column7: and I wasn't in the mood to try it.
